name: Jump down, Fall up
description:
Flip your brain upside down with these gravity friendly/unfriendly puzzles for all my gravity-loving friends. Meet all the characters, like Yellow cube, Blue cube, Red cube, and WEIRD BLACK GOO, you are going to love them, a really lovely bunch.

7 levels where you will need to think outside the box about a bunch of boxes.

Move around with the WASD keys, look around with your mouse, grab cubes with your left mouse button and flip the gravity with the E key.

Controller support is only partially available; you can play, but you'll need to use your mouse for UI stuff, sorry folks, you know how the Gamejam thing works.

Game created for the 2022 Epic Megajam, with lots of love.
